last_episode_to_air.name: ...Through New Beginnings
last_episode_to_air.overview: Neil and Grace get their new business off the ground while Adriana plans to keep Neil in her life for good!

name: Satisfaction
overview: A provocative drama that explores modern marriage at its midpoint. Through the lens of one couple, Neil Truman and his wife, Grace, this series answers the question, “What do you do when having it all is not enough?” by delving into their shocking and unconventional choices.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Investment banker Neil Truman and his wife Grace are sifting through their stagnant relationship when Neil discovers that Grace is seeing a male escort and accidentally gains possession of the escort’s phone. He gains a unique perspective on his life and what motivates women, while Grace contemplates whether her needs are being met and whether her marriage is worth saving.

episodes.name: ...Through Admission
episodes.overview: Grace finds it difficult to rejoin the working world while Neil is encouraged by Adriana to continue pursuing his secret life.

episodes.name: ...Through Competition
episodes.overview: Neil brokers a deal with Simon while Grace enlists Stephanie’s help to reconnect with her artistic side.

episodes.name: ...Through Self Discovery
episodes.overview: Neil tries to remake his public image to atone for a past mistake while pressures at work push Grace to make an impulsive decision.

episodes.name: ...Through Partnership
episodes.overview: Following a security breach, Neil gains unexpected information; Grace receives exposure.

episodes.name: ...Through Exposure
episodes.overview: Neil receives an unusual proposition; Adriana tries to learn more about Neil's home life.

episodes.name: ...Through Terms and Conditions
episodes.overview: Neil struggles with a work deadline while Grace and Anika go on a college visit.

episodes.name: ...Through Security
episodes.overview: Neil contemplates how to handle an ominous warning and Grace discovers some upsetting information.

episodes.name: ...Through Revelation
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace are forced to address Anika’s future as well as their own.

episodes.name: ...Through Resolution
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace deal with the fallout from their secrets and Adriana is startled by a new arrival.

episodes.name: ...Through Release
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace face their infidelities of the past six months. Adriana plots to keep Neil and Grace apart.

episodes.name: ...Through Risk
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace delve further into the escort business.  A ghost from Simon's past shows up at his front door.

episodes.name: ...Through Expansion
episodes.overview: Neil and Simon come to a tenuous business alliance; Adrian a helps Grace expand her business boundaries.

episodes.name: ...Through Bondage
episodes.overview: Neil and Simon legitimize  their partnership while Adriana introduces Grace to the world of BDSM!

episodes.name: ...Through Struggle
episodes.overview: Neil and Adriana's conflict spills out into Bastion while Grace dips her toes back into the dating world!

episodes.name: ...Through Negotiation
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace push the limits of their newfound connection while Adriana throws a kinky 1950's themed party!

episodes.name: ...Through Travel
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace endeavor to win back Bastion's lost investors while Adriana interferes in a family matter!

episodes.name: ...Through Psychedelics
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace extricate Anika from a dangerous situation after experiencing a mind altering drug trip!

episodes.name: ...Through Family
episodes.overview: Neil helps Simon unravel a family mystery  while Adriana and Grace unite to outwit a threatening foe!

episodes.name: ...Through New Beginnings
episodes.overview: Neil and Grace get their new business off the ground while Adriana plans to keep Neil in her life for good!
